key.name: bouncekeys-delay
key.description: Ignore multiple presses of the _same_ key within @delay milliseconds.

key.name: mousekeys-max-speed
key.description: How many pixels per second to move at the maximum speed.

key.name: mousekeys-accel-time
key.summary: How long to accelerate in milliseconds
key.description: How many milliseconds it takes to go from 0 to maximum speed.

key.name: mousekeys-init-delay
key.description: How many milliseconds to wait before mouse movement keys start to operate.

key.name: slowkeys-delay
key.description: Do not accept a key as being pressed unless held for @delay milliseconds.

key.name: stickykeys-latch-to-lock
key.description: Latch modifiers when pressed twice in a row until the same modifier is pressed again.

key.name: stickykeys-two-key-off
key.description: Disable if two keys are pressed at the same time.

key.name: stickykeys-modifier-beep
key.description: Beep when a modifier is pressed.

key.name: capslock-beep-enable
key.description: Beep when a key is pressed while CapsLock is active.

key.name: togglekeys-enable-beep-count
key.summary: Beep count when enabling a modifier
key.description: Number of beeps to emit when enabling a modifier while togglekeys are enabled. Only works with the 'internal' backend.

key.name: togglekeys-enable-beep-delay
key.summary: Delay between beeps when enabling a modifier
key.description: Delay in milliseconds between two beeps when enabling a modifier while togglekeys are enabled. Only works with the 'internal' backend.

key.name: togglekeys-disable-beep-count
key.summary: Beep count when disabling a modifier
key.description: Number of beeps to emit when disabling a modifier while togglekeys are enabled. Only works with the 'internal' backend.

key.name: togglekeys-disable-beep-delay
key.summary: Delay between beeps when disabling a modifier
key.description: Delay in milliseconds between two beeps when disabling a modifier while togglekeys are enabled. Only works with the 'internal' backend.

key.name: togglekeys-backend
key.summary: Implementation to use when togglekeys are enabled
key.description: Selects the backend to use to provide the togglekeys feature. Valid values include 'xkb' (the stock X implementation) and 'internal' (a MATE-specific and more configurable implementation).
